description.en: Adapted from the original novel of Jiuquan Return by Zizi Moyu. 30,000 years ago, he was hailed as the first strong man under the stars, but he hated and buried his bones under the rebellion of the relatives; 10,000 years ago, he became the only emperor on this fertile soil, but he was destroyed under foreign aggression. Died; Five thousand years ago, he led mankind to become the master of this world again, but when he broke the mirror, he went into madness and died. After experiencing the rebirth of the eighth generation, this top starry sky powerhouse finally opened his eyes as an ordinary teenager—Xia Sheng in this life. This time, in the depths of his soul, there were already eight more supreme spiritual springs. How can the hatred and unwillingness of previous lives be vented in this life? Can Xia Sheng in this life change his fate against the sky and achieve his supreme hegemony?
